entry.title: cybruGhost/Simple-diary: Simple-Diary is a lightweight, private, and elegant digital notebook that runs entirely in your browser. It doesn't store your data on a server or database — everything is saved locally on your device, meaning you own your thoughts.
entry.content: Simple-Diary is a lightweight, private, and elegant digital notebook that runs entirely in your browser. It doesn't store your data on a server or database — everything is saved locally on your device, meaning you own your thoughts.

entry.title: musebe/nextjs-cloudinary-ai-video-previews: A Next.js app that automatically generates video previews using Cloudinary’s AI-based media transformations. Easily create dynamic, lightweight video snippets to improve load times, engagement, and SEO.
entry.content: A Next.js app that automatically generates video previews using Cloudinary’s AI-based media transformations. Easily create dynamic, lightweight video snippets to improve load times, engagement, and SEO.

entry.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
entry.content: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.

entry.title: morpheusadam/Chrome-Password-Protector-ZAMO-: is a lightweight and secure Chrome extension that adds an extra layer of protection to your browser by requiring a password before access. Perfect for shared computers, workplaces, or anyone who wants to keep their browsing sessions private.

entry.title: stenciljs/store: Store is a lightweight shared state library by the StencilJS core team. Implements a simple key/value map that efficiently re-renders components when necessary.
